title: Update BrandsBanner logo image sources to provided URLs

requirements.summary: Replace the two brand logo image sources in the HomePage “Brands We Deal In” banner with the provided Siemens and Schneider Electric URLs without affecting any other images or styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The first brand logo image in the banner loads from https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Siemens_AG_logo.svg.
The second brand logo image in the banner loads from https://www.ruralelec.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Schneider-Electric-logo-jpg-.png.
No other images/logos on the page are changed.
The banner layout and existing styling (size, object-contain, grayscale hover effect) remain intact.

file_operations.description: Update only the two existing logo elements rendered by BrandsBanner by changing their src values to the provided Siemens and Schneider Electric URLs; keep the existing mapping/render structure and all existing classes (size, object-contain, grayscale hover effect) unchanged, and do not modify any other images/logos elsewhere.
